meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a flute.
meanings.sent1: The flutey sound of the wind through the trees was soothing.
meanings.sent2: Her flutey voice carried across the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The flutey pattern on her dress reminded me of music.
meanings.sent4: The flutey design of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The flutey aroma of the bakery drew customers in from the street.

meanings.definition: Having a sound or tone similar to that of a flute.
meanings.sent1: The bird's flutey chirping woke me up early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The flutey notes of the piano echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent3: His flutey laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The flutey melody of the song brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The flutey whistle of the kettle signaled that the water was boiling.
